Text:
Nice upload mate..I was wondering,seeing as you are obviously a man who knows his 80's stuff..do you have the cd.. Music of Quality and Distinction..this was an album made up of covers by artists such as Paula Yates(These Boots Are Made For Walking),Tina Turner,Gary Glitter etc and produced by the Heaven 17 guys..been looking for ages everywhere,but no joy !
Cheers

Hi. Thanks for the kind words. I am familiar with that compilation but I know that it's out of print and hard to find. If I come across it will post it here.

Cheers

You got the full collection of "Blindate"? - Also Do you have full album of the Uncanny X-Men? 


I appreciate this awesome collection.. Keep it coming.

I love so much these compilations..especially the tracks I never heard of... 

Thank you 80zforever... you are an 80s erudite indeed[if there is such title..*wink* ]
=)

Excellent series - just came across them when searching for John Foxx.  Now I'm going to have to get them all!

You don't happen to have Foxx's Metamatic, do you?

In referance to the person who asked for Music of Quality and Distinction.  That would be the group B.E.F.  aka British Electric Foundation, produced by the Heaven 17 guys..made up of covers by guest vocalists such as Paula Yates(These Boots Are Made For Walking),Tina Turner,Gary Glitter etc.
They actually made two albums.  I have both.  As soon as I can figure out how to add to torrent and upload I will.  Stay tuned.

i used to own "hired history" by fiat lux; loved it as well as the singles...trying to remember but i think a couple of the singles sounded different than the EP? 

do you happen to have anything from 
section 25 
sad lovers and giants
minny pops
the bags

many thanks...
